entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
